results.title: Metformin Alleviates Pain States by Regulating the Balance of Spinal Synaptic Transmission.
results.text_hl: Intrathecal injection of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ significantly reversed @<m>DISEASE_Mandibular_Nerve_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000080902 @@@nerve injury@@@-induced @GENE_FOS @GENE_314322 @@@c-Fos@@@ (neural activity biomarker) mRNA and protein expression in @DISEASE_Neuralgia @DISEASE_MESH:D009437 @@@neuropathic@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ by regulating @GENE_NOS2 @GENE_24599 @@@NOS2@@@ expression.

citations.NLM: Duan D, Wu X, Ali U, Wang D, Li X, Liu R, Ma L, Mao Y, Ma Y. Metformin Alleviates Pain States by Regulating the Balance of Spinal Synaptic Transmission. J Integr Neurosci. 2024 Jan 11;23(1):6. PMID: 38287855

results.title: The analgesic effect of metformin on paclitaxel-induced neuropathic pain model in rats: By considering pathological results.
results.text_hl: At the same time, recent researches have shown that the clinical improvement of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@ is useful for @<m>DISEASE_Mandibular_Nerve_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000080902 @@@nerve damage@@@.

citations.NLM: Hacimuftuoglu A, Mohammadzadeh M, Taghizadehghalehjoughi A, Taspinar N, Togar B, Nalcı KA, Okkay U, Gundogdu B. The analgesic effect of metformin on paclitaxel-induced neuropathic pain model in rats: By considering pathological results. J Cancer Res Ther. 2020 Jan-Mar;16(1):34-39. PMID: 32362607

results.title: AMPK activation regulates P-body dynamics in mouse sensory neurons in vitro and in vivo
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ treatment normalizes this effect in @<m>DISEASE_Mandibular_Nerve_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000080902 @@@SNI@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ and increases P-body formation in sham animals.

citations.NLM: Paige C, Mejia G, Dussor G, Price T. AMPK activation regulates P-body dynamics in mouse sensory neurons in vitro and in vivo Neurobiol Pain. 2019 Jan-Jul;5():. PMID: 31080914
citations.BibTeX: @article{31080914, title={AMPK activation regulates P-body dynamics in mouse sensory neurons in vitro and in vivo}, author={Paige C and Mejia G and Dussor G and Price T}, journal={Neurobiol Pain}, volume={5}}

results.title: Beneficial Effect of Metformin on Nerve Regeneration and Functional Recovery After Sciatic Nerve Crush Injury in Diabetic Rats.
results.text_hl: Taken together, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ is capable of promoting nerve regeneration after @DISEASE_Sciatic_Neuropathy @DISEASE_MESH:D020426 @@@sciatic nerve injuries@@@ in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes mellitus@@@, highlighting its therapeutic values for peripheral @<m>DISEASE_Mandibular_Nerve_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000080902 @@@nerve injury@@@ repair in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes mellitus@@@.

citations.NLM: Ma J, Liu J, Yu H, Chen Y, Wang Q, Xiang L. Beneficial Effect of Metformin on Nerve Regeneration and Functional Recovery After Sciatic Nerve Crush Injury in Diabetic Rats. Neurochem Res. 2016 May;41(5):1130-7. PMID: 26718830

results.title: The antidiabetic drug metformin prevents and reverses neuropathic pain and spinal cord microglial activation in male but not female mice.
results.text_hl: We have previously shown that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ leads to an enduring resolution of @DISEASE_Neuralgia @DISEASE_MESH:D009437 @@@neuropathic pain@@@ in the spared @<m>DISEASE_Mandibular_Nerve_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000080902 @@@nerve injury@@@ (SNI) model in male @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ and @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Inyang KE, Szabo-Pardi T, Wentworth E, McDougal TA, Dussor G, Burton MD, Price TJ. The antidiabetic drug metformin prevents and reverses neuropathic pain and spinal cord microglial activation in male but not female mice. Pharmacol Res. 2019 Jan;139():1-16. PMID: 30391353
